verses.verse: Now <WG1161> before <WG4253> the feast <WG1859> of the passover <WG3957>, when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> knew <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> his <WG846> hour <WG5610> was come <WG2064> <WG5754> that <WG2443> he should depart <WG3327> <WG5632> out of <WG1537> this <WG5127> world <WG2889> unto <WG4314> the Father <WG3962>, having loved <WG25> <WG5660> his own <WG2398> which <WG3588> were in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>, he loved <WG25> <WG5656> them <WG846> unto <WG1519> the end <WG5056>.

And <WG2532> supper <WG1173> being ended <WG1096> <WG5637>, the devil <WG1228> having now <WG2235> put <WG906> <WG5761> into <WG1519> the heart <WG2588> of Y'hudah <WG2455> of K'riot <WG2469>, SHim`on's <WG4613> son, to <WG2443> betray <WG3860> <WG5632> him <WG846>;

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> the Father <WG3962> had given <WG1325> <WG5758> all things <WG3956> into <WG1519> his <WG846> hands <WG5495>, and <WG2532> that <WG3754> he was come <WG1831> <WG5627> from <WG575> 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> went <WG5217> <WG5719> to <WG4314> 'Elohim <WG2316>;

He riseht <WG1453> <WG5743> from <WG1537> supper <WG1173>, and <WG2532> laid aside <WG5087> <WG5719> his garments <WG2440>; and <WG2532> took <WG2983> <WG5631> a towel <WG3012>, and girded <WG1241> <WG5656> himself <WG1438>.

After that <WG1534> he poureth <WG906> <WG5719> water <WG5204> into <WG1519> a bason <WG3537>, and <WG2532> began <WG756> <WG5662> to wash <WG3538> <WG5721> the Talmidim <WG3101>' feet <WG4228>, and <WG2532> to wipe <WG1591> <WG5721> them with the towel <WG3012> wherewith <WG3739> he was <WG2258> <WG5713> girded <WG1241> <WG5772>.

Then <WG3767> cometh he <WG2064> <WG5736> to <WG4314> SHim`on <WG4613> Kefa <WG4074>: and <WG2532> Kefa <WG1565> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, YY <WG2962>, dost <WG3538> thou <WG4771> wash <WG3538> <WG5719> my <WG3450> feet <WG4228>?

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5662> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, What <WG3739> I <WG1473> do <WG4160> <WG5719> thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1492> <WG5758> not <WG3756> now <WG737>; but <WG1161> thou shalt know <WG1097> <WG5695> hereafter <WG3326> <WG5023>.

Kefa <WG4074> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Thou shalt <WG3538> never <WG1519> <WG165> <WG3364> wash <WG3538> <WG5661> my <WG3450> feet <WG4228>. Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5662> him <WG846>, If <WG3362> I wash <WG3538> <WG5661> thee <WG4571> not <WG3362>, thou hast <WG2192> <WG5719> no <WG3756> part <WG3313> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> to him <WG846>, He that is washed <WG3068> <WG5772> needeth <WG5532> not <WG3756> <WG2192> <WG5719> save <WG2228> to wash <WG3538> <WG5670> his feet <WG4228>, but <WG235> is <WG2076> <WG5748> clean <WG2513> every whit <WG3650>: and <WG2532> ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> <WG5748> clean <WG2513>, but <WG235> not <WG3780> all <WG3956>.

For <WG1063> he knew <WG1492> <WG5715> who <WG3588> should betray <WG3860> <WG5723> him <WG846>; therefore <WG5124> <WG1223> said he <WG2036> <WG5627>, Ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> not <WG3780> all <WG3956> clean <WG2513>.

Ye <WG5210> call <WG5455> <WG5719> me <WG3165> Master <WG1320> and <WG2532> YY <WG2962>: and <WG2532> ye say <WG3004> <WG5719> well <WG2573>; for <WG1063> so I am <WG1510> <WG5748>.

If <WG1487> I <WG1473> then <WG3767>, your YY <WG2962> and <WG2532> Master <WG1320>, have washed <WG3538> <WG5656> your <WG5216> feet <WG4228>; ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> ought <WG3784> <WG5719> to wash <WG3538> <WG5721> one another's <WG240> feet <WG4228>.

For <WG1063> I have given <WG1325> <WG5656> you <WG5213> an example <WG5262>, that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> should do <WG4160> <WG5725> as <WG2531> <WG2532> I <WG1473> have done <WG4160> <WG5656> to you <WG5213>.

Verily <WG281>, verily <WG281>, I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, The servant <WG1401> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> greater than <WG3187> his <WG846> lord <WG2962>; neither <WG3761> he that is sent <WG652> greater than <WG3187> he that sent <WG3992> <WG5660> him <WG846>.
If <WG1487> ye know <WG1492> <WG5758> these things <WG5023>, happy <WG3107> are ye <WG2075> <WG5748> if <WG1437> ye do <WG4160> <WG5725> them <WG846>.

I speak <WG3004> <WG5719> not <WG3756> of <WG4012> you <WG5216> all <WG3956>: I <WG1473> know <WG1492> <WG5758> whom <WG3739> I have chosen <WG1586> <WG5668>: but <WG235> that <WG2443> the scripture <WG1124> may be fulfilled <WG4137> <WG5686>, He that eateth <WG5176> <WG5723> bread <WG740> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> hath lifted up <WG1869> <WG5656> his <WG846> heel <WG4418> against <WG1909> me <WG1691>.

Now <WG575> <WG737> I tell <WG3004> <WG5719> you <WG5213> before <WG4253> it come <WG1096> <WG5635>, that <WG2443>, when <WG3752> it is come to pass <WG1096> <WG5638>, ye may believe <WG4100> <WG5661> that <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> <WG5748> he.

Verily <WG281>, verily <WG281>, I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, He that receiveth <WG2983> <WG5723> whomsoever <WG1437> <WG5100> I send <WG3992> <WG5661> receiveth <WG2983> <WG5719> me <WG1691>; and <WG1161> he that receiveth <WG2983> <WG5723> me <WG1691> receiveth <WG2983> <WG5719> him that sent <WG3992> <WG5660> me <WG3165>.

When Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had <WG2036> thus <WG5023> said <WG2036> <WG5631>, he was troubled <WG5015> <WG5681> in spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> testified <WG3140> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Verily <WG281>, verily <WG281>, I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> shall betray <WG3860> <WG5692> me <WG3165>.
Then <WG3767> the Talmidim <WG3101> looked <WG991> <WG5707> one on another <WG1519> <WG240>, doubting <WG639> <WG5734> of <WG4012> whom <WG5101> he spake <WG3004> <WG5719>.

Now <WG1161> there was <WG2258> <WG5713> leaning <WG345> <WG5740> on <WG1722> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>' bosom <WG2859> one <WG1520> of his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, whom <WG3739> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> loved <WG25> <WG5707>.

SHim`on <WG4613> Kefa <WG4074> therefore <WG3767> beckoned <WG3506> <WG5719> to him <WG5129>, that he should ask <WG4441> <WG5635> who <WG5101> it should <WG302> be <WG1498> <WG5751> of <WG4012> whom <WG3739> he spake <WG3004> <WG5719>.
He <WG1565> then <WG1161> lying on <WG1968> <WG5631> <WG1909> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>' breast <WG4738> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, YY <WG2962>, who <WG5101> is it <WG2076> <WG5748>?

And <WG2532> when he had dipped <WG1686> <WG5660> the sop <WG5596>, he gave <WG1325> <WG5719> it to Y'hudah <WG2455> of K'riot <WG2469>, the son of SHim`on <WG4613>.

And <WG2532> after <WG3326> the sop <WG5596> <WG5119> Satan <WG4567> entered <WG1525> <WG5627> into <WG1519> him <WG1565>. Then <WG3767> said <WG3004> <WG5719> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> unto him <WG846>, That <WG3739> thou doest <WG4160> <WG5719>, do <WG4160> <WG5657> quickly <WG5032>.
Now <WG1161> no man <WG3762> at the table <WG345> <WG5740> knew <WG1097> <WG5627> for what <WG4314> intent <WG5101> he spake <WG2036> <WG5627> this <WG5124> unto him <WG846>.

For <WG1063> some <WG5100> of them thought <WG1380> <WG5707>, because <WG1893> Y'hudah <WG2455> had <WG2192> <WG5707> the bag <WG1101>, that <WG3754> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Buy <WG59> <WG5657> those things that <WG3739> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> need of <WG5532> against <WG1519> the feast <WG1859>; or <WG2228>, that <WG2443> he should give <WG1325> <WG5632> something <WG5100> to the poor <WG4434>.
He <WG1565> then <WG3767> having received <WG2983> <WG5631> the sop <WG5596> went <WG1831> immediately <WG2112> out <WG1831> <WG5627>: and <WG1161> it was <WG2258> <WG5713> night <WG3571>.

Therefore <WG3767>, when <WG3753> he was gone out <WG1831> <WG5627>, Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG3004> <WG5719>, Now <WG3568> is <WG1392> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> glorified <WG1392> <WG5681>, and <WG2532> 'Elohim <WG2316> is glorified <WG1392> <WG5681> in <WG1722> him <WG846>.

If <WG1487> 'Elohim <WG2316> be glorified <WG1392> <WG5681> in <WG1722> him <WG846>, 'Elohim <WG2316> shall <WG1392> also <WG2532> glorify <WG1392> <WG5692> him <WG846> in <WG1722> himself <WG1438>, and <WG2532> shall <WG1392> straightway <WG2117> glorify <WG1392> <WG5692> him <WG846>.

Little children <WG5040>, yet <WG2089> a little while <WG3397> I am <WG1510> <WG5748> with <WG3326> you <WG5216>. Ye shall seek <WG2212> <WG5692> me <WG3165>: and <WG2532> as <WG2531> I said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto the Jews <WG2453>, <WG3754> Whither <WG3699> I <WG1473> go <WG5217> <WG5719>, ye <WG5210> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> <WG5736> come <WG2064> <WG5629>; so <WG2532> now <WG737> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> to you <WG5213>.

A new <WG2537> Mitzvah <WG1785> I give <WG1325> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, That <WG2443> ye love <WG25> <WG5725> one another <WG240>; as <WG2531> I have loved <WG25> <WG5656> you <WG5209>, that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> love <WG25> <WG5725> one another <WG240>.

By <WG1722> this <WG5129> shall <WG1097> all <WG3956> men know <WG1097> <WG5695> that <WG3754> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> my <WG1699> Talmidim <WG3101>, if <WG1437> ye have <WG2192> <WG5725> love <WG26> one to another <WG1722> <WG240>.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5662> him <WG846>, Whither <WG3699> I go <WG5217> <WG5719>, thou canst <WG1410> <WG5736> not <WG3756> follow <WG190> <WG5658> me <WG3427> now <WG3568>; but <WG1161> thou shalt follow <WG190> <WG5692> me <WG3427> afterwards <WG5305>.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5662> him <WG846>, Wilt thou lay down <WG5087> <WG5692> thy <WG4675> life <WG5590> for <WG5228> my sake <WG1700>? Verily <WG281>, verily <WG281>, I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto thee <WG4671>, The cock <WG220> shall <WG5455> not <WG3364> crow <WG5455> <WG5692>, till <WG2193> <WG3739> thou hast denied <WG533> <WG5695> me <WG3165> thrice <WG5151>.
